fr.header: Quelle proportion de PDG cite le mentorat comme outil d'avancement professionnel des femmes ?
fr.explanation: Sélectionnez la bonne réponse dans le menu déroulant.
fr.klf: Selon Catalyst, 44% des PDG citent le mentorat dans le top 3 des stratégies favorisant l'avancement professionnel des femmes.
fr.tips: À l'inverse, l'absence de soutien proactif de la part des hauts dirigeants est un obstacle à l'accès des femmes aux postes de haute direction (source : The Sponsor Effect, Center for Work-Life Policy).

en.header: What proportion of CEOs refer to mentoring as a career advancement tool for women?
en.explanation: Select the correct answer from the drop-down menu.
en.klf: According to Catalyst, 44% of CEOs cited mentorship as one of the top 3 strategies for women's career advancement.
en.tips: Conversely, the lack of proactive support from senior management is a barrier to women's access to senior management positions (source: The Sponsor Effect, Center for Work-Life Policy).

de.header: Welcher Anteil der CEOs hält Mentoring für die Karriereförderung von Frauen?
de.explanation: Wählen Sie im Dropdown-Menü die richtige Antwort aus.
de.klf: Laut Catalyst bewerten 44% der CEOs Mentoring in den Top-3-Strategien zur Förderung von Frauen.
de.tips: Umgekehrt ist das Fehlen einer proaktiven Unterstützung durch die Geschäftsleitung ein Hindernis für den Zugang von Frauen zu Führungspositionen. (Quelle: Sponsor-Effekt, Zentrum für Work-Life-Policy)

es.header: What proportion of CEOs consider mentoring as a tool for the career advancement of women?
es.explanation: Select the correct answer in the drop-down menu.
es.klf: 44% of CEOs place mentoring in the top 3 strategies to promote the advancement of women, according to Catalyst.
es.tips: Conversely, the absence of proactive support from senior management is a barrier to women's access to senior management positions. (Source: The Sponsor Effect, Center for Work-Life Policy)

zh.header: 有多少CEO认为辅导是女性职业发展的工具？
zh.explanation: 在下拉菜单中选择正确的答案。
zh.klf: Catalyst表示，44％的首席执行官将指导纳入促进女性进步的前三大战略。
zh.tips: 相反，高级管理层缺乏积极主动的支持是妇女获得高级管理职位的障碍。 （来源：赞助商效应，工作 - 生活政策中心）
